user_request:
Implement comprehensive multi-factor authentication and enhanced session management
    for improved user security. Include OAuth integration, biometric support,
    and advanced threat detection capabilities.
    
    Priority: High
    Component: Authentication & Security

response.summary: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication and Enhanced Session Management
response.description: This ticket tracks the implementation of comprehensive multi-factor authentication (MFA) and enhanced session management to significantly improve user security. This includes OAuth integration, biometric support, and advanced threat detection capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: MFA is implemented and functional, supporting multiple methods (e.g., TOTP, SMS, email).
OAuth integration is implemented and tested with major providers (e.g., Google, Microsoft).
Biometric authentication is integrated and functional on supported devices.
Session management includes features such as session timeouts, idle session termination, and concurrent session control.
Advanced threat detection capabilities are implemented and actively monitor for suspicious activity.
Comprehensive logging and auditing of authentication and session-related events.
User documentation is updated to reflect the new MFA and session management features.
The system is tested for security vulnerabilities related to authentication and session management.
Performance impact of MFA and enhanced session management is minimized and within acceptable limits.
response.business_value: Enhanced user security reduces the risk of unauthorized access and data breaches, protecting sensitive information and maintaining user trust. Compliance with security standards and regulations. Improved user experience through flexible authentication options. Reduction in support costs related to security incidents.
